amendment.description: An amendment numbered 99 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to prohibit any funds made available by this bill from being used to fund the Farm to School Network Racial Equity Learning Lab.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stauber amendment (A045) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 216 (Roll no. 428).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stauber amendment (A045) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 216 (Roll no. 428).
